name: Derailed 1 -2 -3 (suicide bunny clone)
description: A simple 3 ingredient mix based on Suicide bunny Derailed ejuice a banana and cinnamon sugar cookie recipe...add sweetener of your choice for that commercial taste of course...
author: Slushy

reviews.text: Never tried the original, so I can't base my review on that. But none the less then this is some good stuff that I have mixed a god  handful of times. Every time, I'm as satisfied as I was the first time. Simple, delicious and well made.
its close but not close enough. good for 3,2,1 recipe. cap CDS is alittle high so I knock that down to 1.5 2 % max. it takes over the recipe as its strong.
Never had the original but this version kicks some major butt! Can't put this down. Simple yet amazing! Thank you
It's been a while since I've had Derailed, but this recipe seems awfully close. The banana with cinnamon is a great combination, and it's a simple mix. Thanks for the recipe!
Umm Ya, this is so good. I never doubted it looking at the ingredients but well done!
